Title: The Good of This City
Writer: Julie Rutterford, Richard Warlow (creator), Richard Warlow
Actors: Matthew Macfadyen, Jerome Flynn, Adam Rothenberg, Michael McElhatton
Plot: The mother of a girl who used to work for Long Susan is murdered, along with a rent collector. The girl claims to have no memory of the event, which may be linked to the construction of a new railway.
